content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No structures have been built yet. The agent has only been harvesting resources manually.

ERROR TIPS
### Errors with manual resource harvesting
- When attempting to harvest resources, ensure you are within reach of the resource tile
- The agent tried harvesting from multiple positions but was likely too far from the coal tiles
- Consider checking the actual distance to resource before attempting to harvest

### Coal patch navigation
- When targeting a large resource patch, consider using the actual tile coordinates rather than center coordinates for more precise positioning
- Verify the agent can reach the exact tile position before attempting harvest
